name: Vengeance

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: You must have a close family member or other loved one slain by a specific challenging foe or that foe's minions, or have the Raiders or Vengeance background.

sections.text: You gain a +1 bonus on saving throws, attack rolls, and weapon damage rolls against your chosen foe and known minions of that foe.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You gain a +1 bonus on all saving throws. This bonus stacks with this feats's bonus against your foe and its minions, should they survive.
sections.name: Completion Benefit

prerequisites: You must have a close family member or other loved one slain by a specific challenging foe or that foe's minions
or have the Raiders or Vengeance background
description: The need to avenge those you loved drives you to great deeds.
